data.title: Countess, Troyes Adelaide (Wera) de Burgundy Countess, Troyes
data.meta_description: Pedigree report of Countess, Troyes Adelaide (Wera) de Burgundy Countess, Troyes, daughter of Giselbert De Chalons Duc de Bourgogne, born about 0927 in of, Bourgogne, Marneogne, France. Adelaide (Wera) had a spouse/partner named Count of Troyes Robert Comte de Vermandois Count of Troyes and a child named Adelaide.
data.text:
Adelaide (Wera) was born about 0927 in of, Bourgogne, Marneogne, France. Adelaide (Wera)'s father was Giselbert De Chalons Duc de Bourgogne. Her paternal grandparents were Comte De Vergy Manasses I 'The Old' De Chalons Comte De Vergy and Hermengarde De Bourgogne. She had a sister named Adelaide Comtesse. She was the older of the two children. Adelaide (Wera) is no longer alive.

General Notes

[De La Pole.FTW]

Sources: RC 91, 167, 258; Kraentzler 1142, 1152, 1161, 1194, 1451;

Pfafman, AF; A. Roots 118.

Roots: Adelaide of Burgundy.

RC: Adelaide (Wera) of Burgundy.

K: Wera de Vergy.

AF calls her Adelais "Were" and K. says Were de Vergy.

She was the first wife of Robert.

Also called Adelaide of Chalons, Adelaide de Vermandois, Adelaide de Troyes.

RC 167 says married Geoffrey I in 965. RC 258: Married (1) Robert, Count of

Troyes and Meaux; (2) Lambert of Chalons-sur-Saone; (3) Geoffrey.

Ancestor Pedigree Chart

They had a daughter named Adelaide.

Page last modified
